newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Getronics, ACI in electronic commerce link.
newsitem.headline: Getronics, ACI in electronic commerce link.

text.p: Getronics Transaction and Card Systems BV, a unit of Dutch electronics firm Getronics NV, has established an alliance with Applied Communications Inc (ACI) to work on the field of electronic commerce, Getronics said on Wednesday.

"Electronic commerce combines interactive computer communication with high quality transaction communication such as electronic payments, customer information and electronic data information. It is one of the biggest growth markets within the field of information technology and telecommunications," Getronics said.
ACI and Getronics intend to offer third party processing services, processing electronic transaction traffic such as payments and declarations, on behalf of customers.
ACI is a subsidiary of Transaction Systems Architects Inc and employs over 1,300 people.
It made a net profit of US$15 million in 1996 on a turnover of US$160 million.
